Egypt has some really cool cities. Check it out!
Giza
This city is the site of some of the most impressive ancient monuments in the world!
Alexandria
Known for its history and beaches, Alexandria is one of Egypt's most famous tourist destnations.
Luxor
Located east of the Nile River, this city is is a mark of ancient Egyptian culture.
